participant_1.background:
I keep my clothes clean but my Renaissance Faire outfit is a special case.
i live on a lake.
i want to be an astronaut when i grow up.
I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
Others may be disappointed that I didn't pass the audition, but I'll keep trying my best.

participant_2.background:
I recall spending long hours in the woods with my dog, chasing rabbits and playing hide-and-seek.
i am hoping to move to australia soon to marry my boyfriend.
i am a graduate student.
i am a humble baker.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.

content.text: Hey! I hope you are having a wonderful day!
Thank you! So far so good, you?
Great! Just enjoying the morning sun by the lake. What are you up to?
I'm currently working on my baking. I'm hoping to open my own bakery one day.
Oh that's awesome! I love to bake too. I make a mean chocolate chip cookie.
I'm a huge fan of chocolate chip cookies! Do you have any tips for making them?
Sure! I use two different types of chocolate, and I add a little bit of cinnamon and vanilla. It really brings out the flavor.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try that next time I bake.
You definitely should! It's the perfect fall treat.
Thanks for the tip! I'm sure it will come in handy.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to help out a fellow baker.
It's nice to meet someone who shares my love of baking.
Likewise! It's not a very common hobby.
I know! That's why I'm so excited to meet you.
Me too! Maybe we can bake together sometime?
That would be so much fun! I'd love to learn more from you.
Great! We can exchange recipes and tips.
Perfect! I'll bring the chocolate chips.
